line.person: Afriat, Rebekah, wife of R. Isaac
Asbag, Meir b. Isaac a/k/a Asaboni
Attar, Yom Tob ibn and his daughter Clara
Azrawa, Aliya, the daughter of Shalom, ibn
Ben Attar, Shem Tob b. Abraham
Ben Betito, Judah B. Simon, called Askouri
Ben Shaiya, Luna, the daughter of Musa, Ben Aharpi, a/k/a Ben Shaiya
Ben Shaiya, Masuda, the daughter of Israel, Ben Aharpi, a/k/a Ben Shaiya
Reuben b. Jacob b. Aharpi, a/k/a Ben Shaiya
Ben Shaiya, Samuel b. Mas'dd b. Aharpi, a/k/a Ben Shaiya
Danan, Esther, the daughter of Abraham
Danan, Saadya b. Abraham b. Samuel
Didi, the wife of Mimun ibn
(Ha-Sarfati, Zarefati, Sarfati, Sarfaty, Sarphati, Serfaty, Zarfati)
Ha-Sarfati, Vidal III (father of Abner Israel)
Ibn Zur, Jacob (older contemporary of Jacob 1)
Ibn Zur, Jacob II (son of Solomon Samuel)
Ibn Zur, Raphael | (son of Samuel Il)
Ibn Zur, Samuel I! (son of Raphael Obed)
Ibn Zur, Samuel III (son of Jacob II)
lbn Zur, Saida (widow of Judah Ibn Zur)
Ibn Zur, Solomon Samuel (once known as Samuel, son of Raphael Obed)
Ibn Zur, Ham-Melekh Solomon II Elijah
Ibn Zur, Solomon III (son of Raphael II)
Magirz, Mas’uda (the daughter of Levi b.)
Mamushat, Miriam (the daughter of Abraham ibn)
Maymeran, Abraham b. Joseph b. Isaac
Maymeran, Ephraim Jacob b. Moses Jacob
Meshash, Simha (the daughter of Slieman ibn)
Monsano, Yehonatan Ish Sion (son of Bezalel)
Saadon, Hayyim b. Mas’Ud b. Moses ibn
Saadon, Yom Tob ibn S., b. Yissakhar
Samuel, Simha (the daughter of Hillel ibn)
Sharbit, Donna (daughter of Abraham b. Solomon ibn)
Skali, Esther (daughter of Masuda and Solomon)
Skali, Masuda (wife of Solomon Kohen and daughter of Salim Ha-Kohen)
Tata, Miriam (wife of Dinar ibn T.)
Tata, wife of David b. T.
Uziel, Bilyada (daughter of Isaac b. Judah b. Joseph b. Judah b. Joseph b. Abraham)

line.ref: see also Ben Zaqgen, ibn Zaken
